name: Lotus Health & Counseling Center Llc
specialty: Clinic/Center, Mental Health (Including Community Mental Health Center)

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Lotus Health & Counseling Center Llc is a Clinic/Center, Mental Health (Including Community Mental Health Center) provider based in Miami, FL. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $957K in Medicaid payments across 8K claims serving 1K beneficiaries.
